DOC.brief_summary: Background : - Focal hand dystonia ( FHD ) cause muscle contract , lead abnormal movement posture . Musicians , writer , athlete often get . Researchers want study patient condition learn , process brain depend property call plasticity . Objective : - To study brain plasticity people FHD . Eligibility : - Right-handed adult 18 year old FHD . - Healthy , right-handed adult volunteer . Design : - Participants screen medical history , physical exam , pregnancy test , questionnaire right-handedness . - Participants 2 study visit 2 different day . - Participants sit chair 30 Transcranial Magnetic Stimulation ( TMS ) pulse left side head . A brief electrical current pass wire coil scalp . They hear click may feel pull skin muscle twitch . They may keep eye open remain alert , tense certain muscle , perform simple finger movement . - Forty pulse , 10 second , give leave side head . Some small , big . - Researchers measure muscle response small electrode tap right hand . - A cloth cap put participant head . Researchers write tape cap . - Participants r-PAS . An electrical stimulator place nerve right wrist . Repeated magnetic pulse deliver train short burst together electrical stimulation nerve . Participants receive 840 pulse . - Participants contacted day follow-up check .
DOC.brief_title: Depotentiation People With Focal Hand Dystonia
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : Primary objective : To explore proper parameter create long-term depression ( LTD ) -like effect depotentiation ( DePo ) use rapid paired associative stimulation ( rPAS ) focal hand dystonia ( FHD ) patient Sample Size Population : < TAB > We plan recruit 28 healthy volunteer ( HVs ) 28 FHD patient Movement Disorders Botulinum Toxin ( BoNT ) clinic HMCS . Design : Phase 1 deal HVs phase 2 deal FHD patient . We complete phase 1 start phase 2 . Each phase compose 2 experiment . In phase 1 , experiment 1 2 create LTD-like effect DePo HVs phase 2 , experiment 3 4 elicit LTD-like effect DePo FHD patient . We use regression analysis show motor evoke potential ( MEP ) amplitude decline elicit LTD-like effect DePo . Outcome measurement : Primary outcome : Determining parameter create LTD-like effect DePo HVs FHD use rPAS Secondary outcome : Measuring percent change MEP amplitude apply proper stimulus parameter cause LTD-like effect DePo HVs FHD .
DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Must 18 year old Must righthanded FHD include writer cramp Must able provide consent No open scalp wound scalp infection . Agrees drink caffeine alcohol 48 hour study session . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : Has use illegal drug within past 6 month base history . The intent exclude drug use may affect study result . Participants appear intoxicated time test reschedule . Has 7 alcoholic drink week case woman 14 alcoholic drink week case man . Abnormal finding neurologic exam ( dystonia patient group ) Has brain tumor , stroke , head trauma , epilepsy history seizure . Has major depression major mental disorder ( axis I disorder ) Has neurologic disorder dystonia Has head injury loss consciousness second . Has metal body , cardiac pacemaker , brain stimulator , shrapnel , surgical metal , clip brain , cochlear implant , metal fragment eye , Has know hearing loss . Pregnancy lactation Taking medication act central nervous system stimulant know low seizure threshold , include , imipramine , amitriptyline , doxepine , nortriptyline , maprotiline , chlorpromazine , clozapine , foscarnet , ganciclovir , ritonavir , amphetamine , cocaine , ( MDMA , ecstasy ) , phencyclidine ( PCP , angel dust ) , ketamine , gammahydroxybutyrate ( GHB ) , alcohol , theophylline , mianserin , fluoxetine , fluvoxamine , paroxetine , sertraline , citalopram , reboxetine , venlafaxine , duloxetine , bupropion , mirtazapine , fluphenazine , pimozide , haloperidol , olanzapine , quetiapine , aripiprazole , ziprasidone , risperidone , chloroquine , mefloquine , imipenem , penicillin , ampicillin , cephalosporin , metronidazole , isoniazid , levofloxacin , cyclosporin , chlorambucil , vincristine , methotrexate , cytosine arabinoside , BCNU , lithium , anticholinergic , antihistamine , sympathomimetics .
